div.p: Heras to Taphes my sister, many greetings. Above all I pray you and your family are in good health. You should know that I have written to you twice and you have not written to me in answer to any of the letters. Receive from - - sandy-coloured sandals and a hair shirt and ... of a fruitcake and ... and dates ... that you make the account (?) ... you will write to me. Goodbye To Heras my sister, very many greetings. Above all I pray you are in good health. I write you, until I come up, to thank you for the clothing. I do homage to the god on behalf of you.
To Philadelphia, give to my sister Heras. Translation: P.Leid.Inst. 1 42
